div.bibl: Dziennik Zwiazkowy, Mar. 13, 1918. RECRUITING STATIONS FOR POLISH ARMY IN FRANCERecruiting Center Number 2 Located In Chicago

body.p: Recruiting Center Number 2 for the Polish army in France is located at 984 Milwaukee Avenue. Those in charge of this center are:
Organizers: L. Hadoch, W. F. Rozycki, and S. Krzywonos.
Sergeants: M. Szubert and L. Szwankowski,
For St. Hedwig and St. Mary of Angels parishes: located at 2131 North Hoyne Avenue.
For the community of Bridgeport: located at 3308 South Morgan Street.
For St. John Cantius and Holy Innocents parishes: located on Carpenter Street.
For Town of Lake: located at Slowacki Hall, 1700 West 48th Street.
For Avondale: located at 2946 Milwaukee Avenue.
For St. Adalbert's Parish: located at 1808 South Ashland Avenue.
[List of out-of-town stations omitted by translator].
